Class FileAttachment

java.lang.Object
com.pdfjet.FileAttachment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class FileAttachment extends Object implements Drawable
Used to attach file objects.

      Draw the attachment on the page.
      Specified by:
      drawOn in interface Drawable
      Parameters:
